ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: * Zyber whined again as she saw Striker fall to the ground and go into stasis lock, she looked up at Rowdy.*  We must get him inside! I know that this is you

 * Zyber whined again as she saw Striker fall to the ground and go into stasis lock, she looked up at Rowdy.*

" We must get him inside! I know that this is you den dnall but I cannot sit and watch a bot die."

* With that she transformed into her robot mode and picked up Striker under the arms, she was a little smaller then him and couldn't hold all of his weight by herself.
Zyber began to drag Striker into Rowdy's cave, she looked up at him then back down at the bot in her arms.*

" It would be wise to begin a fire while I find something to bandage his wounds with, please."

________________________________________________

* Iron Raptor growled as she slowly opened her optics for the second time, she was now fully healed and wanted to get out of this CR chamber as fast as possible.
She squinted as the chamber opened and was flooded with light, with a sigh she walked out and looked around as the chamber closed behind her.
Iron Raptor looked down at herself and a small smile played at the corners of her mouth, again she owed Prowl her life.
She looked up and then narrowed her optics, but now it was time to check on the troops which had fought beside her.
Iron Raptor walked slowly towards the bridge, it was then that she realized that she was still weak from the battle...and so were her systems.
She sighed again as she walked slower, there was no reason to over do it right after a repair.*
